snippet: One of the new papers will serve Oakland and the East Bay, and the other Silicon Valley.
abstract: Six daily newspapers in San Francisco Bay Area will merge into two, one serving Oakland and East Bay and the other Silicon Valley.
lead_paragraph: One of the new papers will serve Oakland and the East Bay, and the other Silicon Valley.

headline.print_headline: Six Bay Area Newspapers to Consolidate Into Two
headline.main: Six Bay Area Newspapers to Consolidate Into Two
